1.0.name: wordpress/m1
1.0.description: The m1 theme is a lightweight, responsive, fully customizable theme with beautiful typography. It is designed "mobile first" theme, meaning that it looks great on mobile devices such as iPhone, iPad, Android, and more. Every color is customizable with no coding in the theme customizer, add social icons, a homepage featured image, multiple custom menus, widget areas, layout options, custom logo uploader, and lots more!
